name: Free Weezy - Lil Wayne's Sqvad Up
name_original: Free Weezy - Lil Wayne's Sqvad Up
description:
Welcome to FREE WEEZY, Lil Wayne's updated Sqvad Up game, an addicting, action-packed throwback game inspired by Weezy's love of skateboarding!

*Skate through the streets of Hollygrove, hometown of Lil’ Wayne!
*Grab cash, land cool tricks, and fight back against THE EVIL BIRDS OF PREY!
*Earn your way to some FRESH GEAR in the store, unlock special offers, and pimp out your boards!
*Hit the CASINO to be a big winner and score some new shirts, pants, boards and other prize packs!
*Unlock new members of the SQVAD, and take their SUPER MODE VEHICLES for a ride!
*Compete against friends on the GLOBAL LEADERBOARD! Can you go the distance and lead your pack?
*Rack up ACHIEVEMENTS and share with your friends! Prove that you have what it takes to join the Diamond-level SQVAD.
